comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/148226#issuecomment-1510139376 - Please add this rule:
```adblock
bloomberg.com#@#body:not(:-abp-has(div[class*="player" i][class*="_container"], #root .datastrip)) > div[id^="sp_message_container"]
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
“Welcome to ikanmovie.com, this site focuses on high-definition and high-quality!
The ultra-clear Android system does not support Quark UC, Alook, etc. for the time being!
Recommend Via or bring your own browser to watch the ultra-clear line!
Some ultra-clear lines, such as playback, freezes and freezes!
Please use the backup line to watch temporarily!
Welcome to bookmark the release page: ikandy.vip”

comment.body:
Тем не менее, можете добавить эти правила для открытия сайта.
```adblock
@@||admitad.com^$domain=admitad.com
admitad.com#@#HTML
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.etsy.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @lewisje > A variety of third-party DNS providers, along with the regular AdGuard DNS, return the correct IP addresses for Etsy, but AdGuard Family returns 94.140.14.35 as the IP address for www.etsy.com; that turns out to be the blocked-site page, which fails with a privacy error because the blocked-site page does not have a TLS certificate for etsy.com and that domain has HSTS (one of the bundled HSTS pins in recent browsers), so the TLS failure cannot be bypassed (I forgot to open the "Advanced" button when taking that screenshot, but that's basically what that message said). > > I fail to see how Etsy qualifies as "adult content" worthy of blocking via the family filter. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
buenas.

han cambiado de dominio a .to y ahora vuelve a suceder lo mismo que se arreglo con el .nu

la configuración y filtros sigue siendo la misma que cuando se abrió la petición

un saludo.

This rule rather should not cause adblock detection, it should only redirects to destination page (it works fine on my end).
@jellizaveta Do you still see anti-adblock detection with rule below?
Rule:
```adblock
latinomg.live#%#(function(){if(-1<window.location.href.indexOf("s.php?i=")){var a=location.href.split("s.php?i=");if(a&&a[1]){a=a[1];for(var c=0;10>c;c++)try{a=atob(a)}catch(f){var d=a.replace(/[a-zA-Z]/g,function(b){return String.fromCharCode(("Z">=b?90:122)>=(b=b.charCodeAt(0)+13)?b:b-26)});try{new URL(d);var e=!0}catch(b){e=!1}if(e){window.location=d;break}}}}})();
```
It also should redirects to destination page.

issue.title: google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://google.com/search](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com%2Fsearch) ### Comment > I discovered today that if I search for certain content, I end up with a blank page. The search results will briefly flash on the screen before the page goes blank. After doing a bunch of random searches, it seems this is only an issue when searching for TV shows or movies. If I search for a person, place or thing, I have not had any issues. When Adguard is off, I have no issues. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Okay, so as far as I understand, mentioned rules can be removed and instead of them, these can be added:
```adblock
bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(.bili-video-card__info--ad)
bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(.bili-video-card__info--creative-ad) > .bili-video-card__wrap
bilibili.com#$?#.bili-video-card:has(.bili-video-card__info--creative-ad) > .bili-video-card__skeleton { visibility: visible !important; }
```
I guess that the last one is optional?

comment.body:
Zgaduję, że to podobny problem jak tutaj - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/141951 i powoduje to Francuski filtr.

Spróbuj proszę dodać tę regułę:
```adblock
flashscore.pl#@#.mobile_ad
```
do reguł użytkownika, a potem sprawdź proszę, czy problem nadal występuje.

Jeśli problem będzie nadal występował, to dodaj proszę jeszcze tę regułę:
```adblock
flashscore.pl#@#div[id^="lsadvert-"]
```

issue.title: Lomax.dk / Lomax.se - Broken (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.48.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.lomax.dk/
https://www.lomax.se/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.lomax.dk/
https://www.lomax.se/
```

### Issue:
Frozen pages / modal overlay / broken functions.

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
```
~excellent-hemd.de,~excellent-hose.de,~engie-energie.nl###cookieModal
||policy*.cookieinformation.com^$third-party
```

### Note:
At first glance, only that cosmetic rule seems to cause issues.
However, several problems will occur, due to that network rule as well..
E.g. never-ending animations when adding items to the shopping basket, and nothing appears to happen when you try to remove items from the shopping basket.

### Possible fix:
```
- ~excellent-hemd.de,~excellent-hose.de,~engie-energie.nl###cookieModal
+ ~excellent-hemd.de,~excellent-hose.de,~engie-energie.nl,~lomax.dk,~lomax.se###cookieModal

- @@||policy.cookieinformation.com/uc.js$domain=jysk.nl
+ @@||policy.cookieinformation.com/uc.js$domain=jysk.nl|lomax.dk|lomax.se
```

### Temp fix:
```
lomax.dk,lomax.se#@##cookieModal
@@||policy.app.cookieinformation.com/uc.js$domain=lomax.dk|lomax.se
```

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** _(@kiboke)_
`policy.app.cookieinformation.com$domain=~kartor.eniro.se|~kart.gulesider.no|~kort.degulesider.dk|~map.krak.dk|~altibox.no|~babysam.dk|~elkjop.no|~minaftale.dk|~skousen.dk|~skousen.no|~whiteaway.com|~whiteaway.no|~whiteaway.se|~dvdoo.dk`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v112.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.48.4

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by touching `Check for updates` in AdGuard home.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 홈에 있는 `업데이트 확인`을 터치해서 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>
